nodes.text: Gleelan was an enslaved Rutian Twi'lek male scientist and doctor who was in the employ of the Sith Empire on the planet Balmorra during the Cold War. Lieutenant Major Pirrell used Gleelan, who did not speak Basic, to help a bounty hunter aggravate a nest of Colicoids.
Doctor Gleelan appears in the Bounty Hunter mission "Down With the Queen" on Balmorra in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, which was released in 2011.
